title: Expert Training Course for Laparoscopic Small Intestine Anastomosis Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental laparoscopic surgical techniques and knowledge of digestive system anatomy
context.additional_context: Practical-focused education for surgeons employed at medical device companies.

learning_goals: Safely completing laparoscopic small intestine anastomosis within 45 minutes in a simulated environment
Mastering techniques to minimize anastomosis site leakage risk to below 10%
Achieving at least 80% proficiency in anastomosis skills through peer evaluation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
